definition: to open (a door)/to open up (for development)/to dispel/to refute/to repudiate

sentences.english: I looked around and everything appeared crystal and clear.
sentences.chinese: 我環視周圍，領現一切看上去都晶瑩透闢。

sentences.english: I was amazed to see how readily I understood.
sentences.chinese: 令我喫驚的是，我竟理解得這麼透闢。
